Aries.Aries: Intense, energetic, competitive. Passionate bond but prone to clashes if neither compromises.
Aries.Taurus: Attraction of fire and earth. Aries pushes for action; Taurus wants stability. Works with patience.
Aries.Gemini: Fast-paced, mentally stimulating. Aries leads, Gemini adapts. Fun dynamic but inconsistent.
Aries.Cancer: Opposites. Aries is bold; Cancer sensitive. Needs emotional awareness to thrive.
Aries.Leo: Fiery, dramatic, passionate. Strong attraction and shared ambition; occasional ego battles.
Aries.Virgo: Aries acts fast; Virgo analyzes. Different speeds create friction but also balance.
Aries.Libra: Opposites attract. Aries is direct; Libra diplomatic. Dynamic chemistry requiring fairness.
Aries.Scorpio: Intense, magnetic, sometimes explosive. Power struggles possible but deep passion.
Aries.Sagittarius: Adventurous, free-spirited match. Spontaneity and enthusiasm align well.
Aries.Capricorn: Aries is impulsive; Capricorn disciplined. Can build strong power couple with effort.
Aries.Aquarius: Independent, innovative. Mutual respect for freedom; quirky and exciting pairing.
Aries.Pisces: Aries is assertive; Pisces gentle. Needs empathy and patience to avoid imbalance.

Taurus.Aries: Steady Taurus vs. impulsive Aries. Can work with compromise and shared goals.
Taurus.Taurus: Stable, loyal, sensual pair. Slow-moving but deeply committed.
Taurus.Gemini: Gemini seeks variety; Taurus wants consistency. Needs communication and flexibility.
Taurus.Cancer: Comforting, secure bond. Emotional harmony and loyalty highlight compatibility.
Taurus.Leo: Both value loyalty but differ in expression. Taurus steady; Leo dramatic. Needs respect.
Taurus.Virgo: Earthy, practical, supportive. Strong potential for long-term stability.
Taurus.Libra: Both love beauty and harmony. Taurus grounded; Libra social. Needs balanced expectations.
Taurus.Scorpio: Intense attraction. Both stubborn; deep emotional and physical connection.
Taurus.Sagittarius: Freedom-loving Sagittarius may unsettle Taurus. Needs space and trust.
Taurus.Capricorn: Strong, reliable foundation. Shared values and mutual support.
Taurus.Aquarius: Aquarius unconventional; Taurus traditional. Interesting but challenging.
Taurus.Pisces: Gentle, intuitive connection. Emotional depth and kindness thrive here.

Gemini.Aries: Fast-paced, exciting. Strong mental and physical chemistry.
Gemini.Taurus: Gemini flexible; Taurus fixed. Requires patience and adaptability.
Gemini.Gemini: Energetic, witty connection. Fun but may lack grounding.
Gemini.Cancer: Cancer emotional; Gemini intellectual. Needs mutual understanding.
Gemini.Leo: Playful, creative, lively. Leo leads; Gemini entertains.
Gemini.Virgo: Both ruled by Mercury; strong mental bond. Virgo serious; Gemini playful.
Gemini.Libra: Air sign harmony. Balanced, romantic, socially active.
Gemini.Scorpio: Gemini light; Scorpio intense. Challenging but transformative.
Gemini.Sagittarius: Opposites. Adventurous, curious, great chemistry and growth.
Gemini.Capricorn: Capricorn grounded; Gemini spontaneous. Needs effort and structure.
Gemini.Aquarius: Innovative, mentally stimulating. Great friendship and romance potential.
Gemini.Pisces: Gemini changeable; Pisces emotional. Sensitive balance required.

Cancer.Aries: Emotional vs. fiery. Needs empathy and patience.
Cancer.Taurus: Warm, nurturing, stable. Very compatible for long-term.
Cancer.Gemini: Cancer sensitive; Gemini detached. Requires emotional communication.
Cancer.Cancer: Deep emotional bond. Caring but can be overly protective.
Cancer.Leo: Cancer nurturing; Leo expressive. Needs balance of attention and care.
Cancer.Virgo: Supportive, gentle connection. Emotional and practical harmony.
Cancer.Libra: Cancer emotional; Libra social. Needs compromise on lifestyle.
Cancer.Scorpio: Intense, loyal, emotionally profound. Strong connection.
Cancer.Sagittarius: Cancer seeks security; Sagittarius freedom. Needs trust.
Cancer.Capricorn: Opposites complement. Emotional + practical balance works well.
Cancer.Aquarius: Cancer emotional; Aquarius rational. Challenging but growth-filled.
Cancer.Pisces: Very harmonious. Intuitive, soft, empathetic pairing.

Leo.Aries: Fiery, passionate, bold. Strong attraction and shared drive.
Leo.Taurus: Stable Taurus vs dramatic Leo. Needs patience and respect.
Leo.Gemini: Fun, expressive, vibrant. Socially active and mentally stimulating.
Leo.Cancer: Warm but different needs. Leo wants admiration; Cancer wants security.
Leo.Leo: Dramatic, passionate, powerful. Needs shared spotlight.
Leo.Virgo: Leo expressive; Virgo modest. Mutual respect builds bond.
Leo.Libra: Romantic, artistic, harmonious. Strong aesthetic connection.
Leo.Sagittarius: Fiery, adventurous, optimistic. Great chemistry and excitement.
Leo.Capricorn: Leo bold; Capricorn serious. Strong but requires compromise.
Leo.Aquarius: Opposites. Leo expressive; Aquarius detached. Unique and electric.
Leo.Pisces: Pisces sensitive; Leo proud. Needs gentle communication.

Virgo.Aries: Different tempos. Aries impulsive; Virgo careful. Growth opportunity.
Virgo.Gemini: Strong mental bond but different stability needs.
Virgo.Cancer: Supportive and nurturing. Emotionally thoughtful pairing.
Virgo.Leo: Virgo modest; Leo bold. Needs mutual appreciation.
Virgo.Virgo: Orderly, careful, detailed. Stable but may overthink.
Virgo.Libra: Virgo practical; Libra idealistic. Needs balanced expectations.
Virgo.Scorpio: Deep, analytical, intense. Emotional and intellectual depth.
Virgo.Sagittarius: Virgo structured; Sagittarius free. Challenging but enlightening.
Virgo.Aquarius: Different priorities. Virgo practical, Aquarius unconventional.
Virgo.Pisces: Opposites. Logic vs emotion. Deep spiritual growth possible.

Libra.Aries: Opposites attract. Dynamic balance of assertive and gentle.
Libra.Taurus: Both appreciate beauty but differ in pace.
Libra.Virgo: Virgo grounded; Libra social. Needs shared rhythm.
Libra.Libra: Harmonious, romantic, balanced. Can avoid conflict too much.
Libra.Scorpio: Intense Scorpio vs diplomatic Libra. Complicated but magnetic.
Libra.Capricorn: Capricorn disciplined; Libra flexible. Mutual respect helps.
Libra.Pisces: Idealistic pair. Dreamy but needs grounding.

Scorpio.Taurus: Opposing signs. Deep loyalty and intensity.
Scorpio.Gemini: Scorpio deep; Gemini light. Hard but transformative.
Scorpio.Virgo: Quiet depth. Strong mental and emotional alignment.
Scorpio.Libra: Libra light; Scorpio intense. Magnetic but uneven.
Scorpio.Scorpio: Extremely intense. Deep connection or power struggle.
Scorpio.Sagittarius: Freedom vs depth. Challenging but exciting.
Scorpio.Aquarius: Scorpio emotional; Aquarius detached. Difficult but electric.

Sagittarius.Taurus: Taurus stable; Sagittarius free. Needs compromise.
Sagittarius.Scorpio: Intense vs free. Passion but tension.
Sagittarius.Capricorn: Fun vs discipline. Challenging but purposeful.

Capricorn.Aries: Drive vs discipline. Potential power couple.
Capricorn.Taurus: Strong, stable, mutual respect. Very compatible.
Capricorn.Gemini: Gemini free; Capricorn structured. Needs effort.
Capricorn.Aquarius: Capricorn traditional; Aquarius unconventional. Unique bond.
Capricorn.Pisces: Capricorn practical; Pisces dreamy. Balancing energy.

Aquarius.Cancer: Emotion vs intellect. Difficult but meaningful.
Aquarius.Scorpio: Detached vs intense. Complicated but powerful.
Aquarius.Pisces: Dreamy vs rational. Needs effort to synchronize.

Pisces.Aries: Gentle vs assertive. Needs empathy from Aries.
Pisces.Leo: Pisces gentle; Leo bold. Needs balance.
Pisces.Sagittarius: Idealistic pairing; different needs for security.
Pisces.Pisces: Deep emotional and spiritual connection; may lack structure.
